contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 20, 2011 D West Midlands Brass Band Association Contest (3rd section)
West Midlands BBA Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Midlands BBA Contest west-midlands-brass-band-association-contest-3rd-s
High School, Pershore Award to best instrumentalist in the Section: Mark Hanson, Euphonium – Rushden Windmill.
From the WMBBA Website: "Unfortunately, the WMBBA has cancelled the Fourth Section due to lack of entries. The only Fourth Section band to enter has been invited to play in the Third Section and has accepted."
Oct. 25, 2011, 2:55 p.m. Feb. 13, 2012, 8:52 p.m.
1 Cubbington Silver Band Alexander Webb The Dark Side of the Moon
2 Stourport-on-Severn Brass Band Michael West
3 Rushden Windmill Band John Fletcher
4 Shipston Town Band Howard Gibbs
5 City of Birmingham Band Warren Belshaw The Plantagenets
6 Amington Band Wesley Kendrick The Frogs of Aristophanes
7 West Mercia Police Band Alwyn Green
8 Newhall Band Kevin Holdgate Saint-Saëns Variations
